name: Ebony Bow

refinement_effect.refine_one: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin enemies by 40%.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin enemies by 50%.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin enemies by 60%.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin enemies by 70%.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin enemies by 80%.

description: A longbow made of ebony wood with stiffer limbs than ordinary bows. It is also a far more powerful weapon.
